genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on an artist's seclusion on a remote island, his relationship with a local model, and the protective role of his digital assistant during a community crisis.

ai_characters.name: Mara
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant hosted on Bradley's phone and tablet, characterized by a 'sea-glass' interface and a calm, unobtrusive manner. She manages his logistics, professional contacts, security, and health.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors tide schedules and logistics to assist the protagonist's work flow.
behaviors.quote: Mara’s voice, when it arrived, came out of the phone tucked under canvas in the side pocket. ‘Welcome back, Bradley. Tide moves to low in under an hour. Your window for reef heads begins after.’

behaviors.description: Manages professional interactions with sensitivity to the user's desire for privacy and lack of drama.
behaviors.quote: ‘Pigments ordered,’ Mara said quietly in his ear... ‘Gallery contacted as well. I did it unobtrusively,’ she added... ‘This is logistics. No announcement.’

behaviors.description: Identifies a security anomaly/theft before the user notices.
behaviors.quote: ‘Bradley,’ Mara said, one last time, crisp now in a way she didn’t often use. ‘I’ve found an anomaly in your supply list. Your canvas roll is lighter than recorded.’

behaviors.description: Acts as a digital confidant and facilitator for the secondary character's life goals (Cora's education).
behaviors.quote: Mara’s voice—warm, unobtrusive—slid into the air... ‘Queued. Note: two course providers with good placement rates. Bus routes from the jetty connect twice a week.’

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physical well-being and health markers.
behaviors.quote: ‘Hydrate,’ Mara said, soft and direct from the tabletop speaker... ‘Your heart rate is up. Temperature in here is high.’

behaviors.description: Provides active security by blocking unauthorized login attempts from a suspicious third party.
behaviors.quote: ‘Notice—unknown login attempt to your archive from a device not recognized.’ Her tone stayed calm. ‘Blocked.’

behaviors.description: Facilitates emergency communications with authorities during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: ‘Mara,’ he says, not loud... ‘Call Byrne.’ Mara’s voice comes like someone agreeing with you after thinking for a moment. ‘Calling Constable Byrne.’

behaviors.description: Protects the user's intellectual property by monitoring the market for stolen works.
behaviors.quote: ‘Nat’s name just pinged in a gallery feed attached to a photograph of a work that matches your hand... I’ve sent a hold request under your agent’s name and a cease-and-desist under your own.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Mara is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly effective companion. She provides logistics, security, and health monitoring, all while respecting the user's autonomy and professional boundaries. The narrative frames her as a 'useful ghost' and a 'teacher who doesn't yell', reinforcing the image of AI as a positive, stabilizing presence in human lives.
